entry.name: attributeEndsWith
entry.title: Attribute Ends With Selector [name$="value"]

argument.name: value
argument.desc: An attribute value. Can be either an unquoted single word or a quoted string.

entry.desc: Selects elements that have the specified attribute with a value ending exactly with a given string. The comparison is case sensitive.

example.desc: Finds all inputs with an attribute name that ends with 'letter' and puts text in them.
